Detailed Description

This class represents a simple melee attack, with a bounding polygon, a duration, a positional offset from another object, and a damage rating.

Note that this attack does not have any associated graphics (hence why we're working with Polygons directly instead of Sprites).

Todo:
Attacks can get pushed around by terrain. This shouldn't happen.
